titleStmt.title: Despatch from J. Milton Turner to John L. Cadwalader, March 10, 1877

bibl.title: Despatch from J. Milton Turner to John L. Cadwalader
Despatches from United States Consuls in Monrovia, 1852-1906

div1.p:
Consulate General of United States
Republic of Liberia

J Milton Turner
to
Department of State
Washington U.S.A.
Transmitting Report for the Quarter ended December 31, 1876.

No. 1. Statement of Salary Account
" 2. Contingent Expense
" 3. Arrival and departure of vessels.
" 4 Letters received
" 5 " " sent.
" 6

Consulate General of the United States
Monrovia, Liberia, March 10. 1877

I have the honor to transmit herewith, with expressions of regret at the lateness thereof, my report for the quarter ended December 31, 1876: The detention of this report until this date was owing to my absence in the United States.

I have the honor to be
Sir:
With high considerations
Your obedient servant
J Milton Turner
div1.fw:
Honorable
John L. Cadwalader
Assistant Secretary of State, Washington.
